answers.answer: Yep. Got so much better when I started taking more iron. Occasionally get it from eating too many carbs at breakfast so I need to make sure I have enough protein (I find a yoghurt, avocado, greens, almond, milk and banana smoothie keeps me steady). So mine was from the whole combo of low iron, low blood pressure and low blood sugar in morning.
Still, not a bad idea to call your doctor and let him/her know what's going on.
Are u swollen also, could be preeclampsia. U should check
Not swollen. Just can't stand in one spot for longer than like 5 minutes
May have to do with high blood pressure. Just found this out today & now I'm being tested for preeclampsia myself. Definitely let your doctor know.
Definitely sounds like high blood pressure. Go in immediately, DO NOT WAIT.
I did my heart was skipping beats also. Went to the hospital and my electrolytes were out of balance I would call your doctor

title: Dizzy and seeing dots
